content.raw:
Hello:

Thanks for the report. I think that you suffered from a bug [we discovered](#!/osrf/gazebo/issues/2141/risk-of-mixing-ign-math2-and-ign-math3) during the beta releases of gazebo8. It probably comes from the mix of ignition-math2 and ignition-math3 libraries in memory. Yesterday we released new ignition-math3 packages which should conflict with ignition-math2. Could you please update to the latest gazebo8 release and try again?

I assume that you build the ROS wrappers from source after installing gazebo8.
content.html:
Hello:

Thanks for the report. I think that you suffered from a bug we discovered during the beta releases of gazebo8. It probably comes from the mix of ignition-math2 and ignition-math3 libraries in memory. Yesterday we released new ignition-math3 packages which should conflict with ignition-math2. Could you please update to the latest gazebo8 release and try again?

I assume that you build the ROS wrappers from source after installing gazebo8.
